content:
That sounds like an amazing time! Family reunions are always a blast, and it's great that you have such wonderful memories to cherish. A photo booth is a fantastic idea - I'm sure it added an extra layer of fun to the celebration. Did you have any particularly funny or memorable moments from the reunion?

And I'm thrilled that you're considering Indiana Dunes State Park for your camping trip! It's a beautiful park with plenty of activities to enjoy. The dunes themselves are breathtaking, and the scenic views of Lake Michigan are just stunning. Make sure to take a hike to the top of Mount Baldy, and if you're feeling adventurous, try your hand at dune hiking or take a guided nature walk.

Remember to plan ahead and book your campsites early, especially since you have a larger group. You might also want to consider reserving a picnic shelter or group campsite to accommodate your group's needs. Have a fantastic trip, and I hope you create many more wonderful memories with your family!
